price: 5. Qofkii rajeyn la kulanka Alle, hubaal ajasha uu Alle (qoray) way imaan (ee ha isu diyaariyo), Allena waa wax kasta Maqlaha, wax kasta Ogsoonaha ah.
arabic: مَن كَانَ يَرۡجُواْ لِقَآءَ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ لَأٓتٖۚ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلۡعَلِيمُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: man kāna yarjū liqāa al-lahi fa-inna ajala al-lahi laātin wahuwa al-samīʿu al-ʿalīmu
